AppDB.Name: NIF_ETHU_TX_LANE_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure TX controls per lane

Field.Description: Stop TX data towards the PM
Field.Name: STOP_DATA

Field.Description: Continueously grants EGQ credits to the NIF port
Field.Name: FLUSH

Field.Description: Stop sending credits to the EGQ for the corresponding NIF port
Field.Name: STOP_EGRESS_CREDITS

Field.Description: Put the lane in reset in the NMG
Field.Name: NMG_RESET

Field.Description: Put the lane in reset
Field.Name: RESET

Field.Description: Reset credits from the PM to the value in CREDIT_VALUE
Field.Name: CREDIT_RESET

AppDB.Name: NIF_CDU_TX_LANE_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure TX controls per lane in CDU unit

Field.Description: Start transmit TX data only after reaching this threshold (64B words)
Field.Name: START_THR

AppDB.Name: NIF_CLU_TX_LANE_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure TX controls per lane in CLU unit

Field.Description: Start transmit TX data only after reaching this threshold (64B words)
Field.Name: START_THR

AppDB.Name: NIF_ETHU_RX_RMC_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to control NIF ETHU RMC (RX Memory Controler) configurations

Field.Description: First entry to be used by the RMC. (out of 1K entries)
Field.Name: MLF_FIRST_ENTRY

Field.Description: Last entry to be used by the RMC. (out of 1K entries)
Field.Name: MLF_LAST_ENTRY

Field.Description: Put the RMC in reset in the NMG
Field.Name: NMG_RESET

Field.Description: Put the RMC in reset in the ETHU
Field.Name: RESET

Field.Description: 0-1. channel will be translated into reassembly context towards the IRE.
Field.Name: CHANNEL

Field.Description: Indicate whether this RMC is tdm priority. 1=TDM
Field.Name: IS_TDM

Field.Description: Indicate whether this RMC is high priority. 1=High
Field.Name: IS_HIGH

Field.Description: Indicate whether this RMC is low priority. 1=Low
Field.Name: IS_LOW

Field.Description: After RMC reach overflow, write to the RMC will resume only when fifo level is below this thr.
Field.Name: THR_AFTER_OVF

Field.Description: RMC FIFO level
Field.Name: FIFO_LEVEL

Field.Description: Drop all incoming data to RMC
Field.Name: DROP_DATA

Field.Description: Put RMC into flush mode
Field.Name: FLUSH_RMC

Field.Description: Enable start TX for RMC
Field.Name: START_TX_EN

Field.Description: Enable credit for L1 mismatch rate feature
Field.Name: MISMATCH_RATE_CREDIT_EN

Field.Description: Credit reset for L1 mismatch rate
Field.Name: MISMATCH_RATE_CREDIT_RESET

Field.Description: RMC start tx threshold for L1 mismatch rate
Field.Name: START_TX_THR

AppDB.Name: NIF_ETHU_RX_LANE_TO_RMC_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure NIF CDU controls per lane

Field.Description: Lane to RMC map is active
Field.Name: ACTIVE

AppDB.Name: NIF_ETHU_RX_PRIORITY_TO_RMC_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table maps from physical lane and PRD priority (0-3 / TDM) to RMC number

Field.Description: RMC number associated with the lane and PRD priority
Field.Name: RMC

Field.Description: Debug indication to mark the RMC mapping is valid
Field.Name: RMC_VALID

AppDB.Name: NIF_CDU_MAC_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure the NIF scheduler per CDU id and priority

Field.Description: Enable the MAC
Field.Name: ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable the Async unit associated with the MAC
Field.Name: ENABLE_ASYNC_UNIT

AppDB.Name: NIF_CDU_MAC_MODE_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure the NIF MAC mode

Field.Description: MAC operation mode: 0=one port, 1=two ports, 2=four ports, 3=three ports(0,2,3) 4=three ports(0,1,2)
Field.Name: MAC_MODE_CONFIG

AppDB.Name: NIF_CDU_GEAR_SHIFT_RESET
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to reset MAC per CDU

Field.Description: Reset the GS (since port or MAC is being reset)
Field.Name: GS_RESET

AppDB.Name: NIF_CLU_GEAR_SHIFT_RESET
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to reset one of four GSs per CLU

Field.Description: Reset the GS (since port or MAC is being reset)
Field.Name: GS_RESET

AppDB.Name: NIF_ETHU_TX_CREDIT_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure NIF Credit controls per ETHU

Field.Description: See CREDIT_RESET in NIF_ETHU_TX_LANE_CTRL
Field.Name: CREDIT_VALUE

AppDB.Name: NIF_ETHU_SCH_CNT_DEC_THRESHOLD
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to threshold for scheduler counter decrement per ETHU

Field.Description: When flush is set in the unit, the local SCH blocks requests from the RMC, asserts cnt_dec (1 bit) towards the NMG and decrements the RMC transaction counter each cycle by 1. Cnt_dec will only assert if counter value is above a TH.
Field.Name: SCH_CNT_DEC_THRESHOLD

AppDB.Name: NIF_CDU_PM_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure port-macro controls per CDU

Field.Description: Enable Energy Efficient Ethernet
Field.Name: EEE_ENABLE

Field.Description: PM input - put all the PM lanes in/out of reset
Field.Name: PM_LANES_RESET

Field.Description: PM input - put all the entire PM in/out of reset
Field.Name: PM_RESET

Field.Description: PM input - put the whole PM in IDDQ state
Field.Name: IDDQ

AppDB.Name: NIF_SCHEDULER_CTRL

Field.Description: Set RX flush context
Field.Name: FLUSH_CONTEXT

Field.Description: Resets the per-port transaction counter in SCH
Field.Name: NMG_RESET

Field.Description: Indication whether ILKN is operation as ELK(external lookup).
Field.Name: ELK_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable the ILKN port to pause Tx traffic in reaction to RxLLFC.
Field.Name: RX_LLFC_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable the second ILKN port in this core.
Field.Name: SECOND_PORT_ENABLE

Field.Description: Ilkn FEC global enable - will reset all FEC modules connected to this core

AppDB.Name: NIF_ILE_PORT_ENABLERS

Field.Description: Enable RX of the ILKN port.

AppDB.Name: NIF_ETHU_RX_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to control NIF ETHU configurations per ETHU id

Field.Description: ETHU RX flush enable
Field.Name: FLUSH_ENABLE

Field.Description: Disable masking of TDM indication from parser.

Field.Description: Credit value for Mismatch rate.

AppDB.Name: NIF_RX_CORE_CTRL

AppDB.Name: NIF_ILE_STATUS

Field.Description: Tell the PP Parser what priority to give to packets the parser did not recognize.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_ETHU_TCAM
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD Parser soft stage TCAM table. if there is a match, priority will be taken from the matching entry.

Field.Description: Ether Type code. bits 32:35 of the comparable value of the entry.
Field.Name: ETHER_TYPE_CODE

Field.Description: Mask for the Ether Type code. 0=>Don't care, 1=>Valid.
Field.Name: ETHER_TYPE_CODE_MASK

Field.Description: This part of the entry will be compared to the 32bits taken from the 4 offsets used to build the key.
Field.Name: ENTRY_OFFSETS_VALUE

Field.Description: Mask for the offsets part of the key. 0=>Don't care, 1=>Valid.
Field.Name: ENTRY_OFFSETS_MASK

Field.Description: Priority for the entry. if the ether type and offsets value match after mask, this priority will be chosen for the packet
Field.Name: PRIORITY

Field.Description: TDM indication
Field.Name: TDM

Field.Description: Indicate whether this entry is valid for compare.
Field.Name: VALID

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_ILU_TCAM
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD Parser soft stage TCAM table. if there is a match, priority will be taken from the matching entry.

Field.Description: Ether Type code. bits 32:35 of the comparable value of the entry.

Field.Description: Indicate whether this entry is valid for compare.

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_ETHU_RX_QMLF_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: When the Rx MLF has more than RxPfcThresholdSet valid entries, it sets the indication to send Class Based flow controls.
Field.Name: PFC_THRESHOLD_SET

Field.Description: When the Rx MLF has less than RxPfcThresholdClr valid entries, it clears the indication to send Class Based flow controls.
Field.Name: PFC_THRESHOLD_CLR

Field.Description: When the Rx MLF has more than RxnLlfcThresholdSet valid entries, is sets the indication to send link-level FC to the link partner.
Field.Name: LLFC_THRESHOLD_SET

Field.Description: When the Rx MLF has more than RxnLlfcThresholdClr valid entries, is clears the indication to send link-level FC to the link partner.
Field.Name: LLFC_THRESHOLD_CLR

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_ILU_PARAMETERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Parameters to configure Inband ILKN flow control.

Field.Description: If set, will enable the ILKN port to pause Tx traffic in reaction to RxLLFC. Otherwise, the ILKN port will let the CFC process RxLLFC
Field.Name: REC_LLFC_EN

Field.Description: f set, will extract RxLLFC from channel 0 of the in-band ChFC indicated by link partner
Field.Name: REC_LLFC_ON_CH_0

Field.Description: If set, will extract RxLLFC once every 16 channels (0, 16, 32, 48, 240) from the in-band ChFC indicated by link partner
Field.Name: REC_LLFC_EVERY_16_CHS

Field.Description: If set, will place TxGenLLFC on channel 0 of the in-band ChFC that will be indicated to link partner
Field.Name: GEN_LLFC_ON_CH_0

Field.Description: If set, will place TxGenLLFC once every 16 channels (0, 16, 32, 48, 240) of the in-band ChFC that will be indicated to link partner
Field.Name: GEN_LLFC_EVERY_16_CHS

Field.Description: If set will place TxGenLLFC on all the channels of the inband channel flow control
Field.Name: GEN_LLFC_ON_ALL_CHS

Field.Description: If set, will indicates LLFC to the link partner (TxGenLLFC) when ILKN port is not aligned (Rx not ready).
Field.Name: GEN_LLFC_FROM_ILKN_STATUS

Field.Description: If set, the fullness level of RX TDM HRF will be able to trigger gen_llfc
Field.Name: GEN_LLFC_FROM_RX_TDM_HRF

Field.Description: If set, the fullness level of RX DATA HRF will be able to trigger gen_llfc
Field.Name: GEN_LLFC_FROM_RX_DATA_HRF

Field.Description: Inband Tx Flow Control Calendar Length for ILKN port 0 (used for stop_tx from RX-CHFC). This is the number of valid bits in the 256 bits vector from the FC unit in the NBI. The setting are as follows:4'd0-> length of 16, 4'd1->32, 4'd3->64, 4'd7->128, 4'd15->256
Field.Name: TX_CAL_LEN

Field.Description: The length of the nif2cfc CHFC calendar for ILKN RX
Field.Name: CHFC_REC_CAL_LEN
